title: Talent Acquisitions Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Boise, ID)
Interview Descriptions:
Ability to have a virtual interview
Provided brief overview of the company
Described department culture
Described daily job responsibilities 
Described what the future goals for the department and the company
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to work at this company?
Tell me about yourself.

title: Outpatient Clinic RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Takes weeks to get any update on application status. Then a few more weeks to get an interview. All in all, it was well over 1 1/2 months just to get to the offer of employment.
Interview Questions: Typical questions of... tell me about a time that you had conflict, tough decision, worked with someone not pulling their weight.

title: Talent Acquisition Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: First interview was over Microsoft Teams. They asked basic questions, like scenarios, how you stay organized, how you prioritize etc. About 45 minute interview. Really enjoyed my time talk to the two ladies.
Interview Questions: How do you manage timelines? How do you feel working remote? How do you prioritize your work/stay organized? Why this position?

title: Health Screener Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System in Nov 2021
Interview Descriptions: the interview was an online video call and was very simple to access. They also asked about covid 19 vaccinations, as it is required by the company to have it.
Interview Questions: They asked about my availability and if I was willing to travel to other locations

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Very easy process, and the beginning started by doing a video chat online at your own time. It was very easy to go through everything. I would recommend a cover letter to give yourself a better view to them than anyone else.
Interview Questions: Difficult situation that you surpassed

title: Rad Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Over all good. I got offered the job after the first interview was done. Took me about 8 tries to get an interview though. Not the most ideal offer but it wasn’t terrible either.
Interview Questions: How did you deal with a situation where a coworker who did not like you

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: It was a one on one interview with the floatpool manager. It was a very casual and comfortable conversation. She asked a lot of "give me an example of a time..." questions.
Interview Questions: What is your strongest quality? Give an example.

title: RN Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: 4 Nurses were in the interview panel, general questions and 2 case study questions - one about a care bundle and specific patient with signs and symptoms, meds, etc. Nurses were very friendly, the campus is beautiful.
Interview Questions: Case Study questions

title: Clinical Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with three people.  Lots of background noise. Took one hour, lots of tell me about a time when questions.  No mention of what next steps were.  Zero follow up or feedback.  Overall was remarkably unprofessional on several levels.
Interview Questions: See above, open ended and panel took turns.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Initial HR response was a week after I applied via email with secondary questionnaire. Took about two more weeks before I got an in person interview. Interview was more casual then expected. Sat in office with officer manager and nurse manager. Questions were candid and the interview flowed well. Received call the next day from HR with an offer. Overall a positive experience.
Interview Questions: Why are you interested in saint alphonsus

title: Facilities Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Ontario, OR) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very professional interview i sat with 3 people and had one on the phone. It was a little confusing because all of them were asking questions at the same time and it was very fast paced.
Interview Questions: why did you choose to apply at St Alphonsus?

title: Patient Services Registration Float Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Nampa, ID) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview in office - not meeting room, overview of position: hours, flexibility, locations, 3 day training,  and how scheduling works. Informal atmosphere. Sheet of standard interview questions. Ability to ask questions. They give HR a thumbs up or thumbs down. HR makes decision and contacts you with an offer. Interviewer doesn't know pay, approx. +/-$12
Interview Questions: Something that isn't on your resume.

title: Ortho/Joints Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Nampa, ID) in May 2016
Interview Descriptions: You apply online for specific positions. The system is a bit antiquated because it imports a lot of information from your resumé but formats it horribly. If your application gets interest, then the nurse recruiter calls to set up an interview.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with a situation in which a co-worker is lazing around while everyone else is hussling?

title: Registered Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: manager brought me to a confers room. Manger , MA, 2 different PSR, and manager of accounts  advised me of the position and the plans on moving people around. Hiring new people and the different specialties they have. Individually they let me know wha there duties were daily.
Interview Questions: How comfortable am I giving injections, rooming patients and obtaining vitals, drawing blood, answering phone, obtaining prior authorization for patients medicine/diagnostic procedures. How soon do you call patients back when they call and leave message. Am I able to perform some duties at the front desk checking in patients.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Boise, ID) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process is heavily based on your ability to resolve interoffice conflicts which in itself should be a warning . The salary was negotiated easily, however, and the job expectations were clearly set.
Interview Questions: What is the most difficult obstacle you have encountered in your worklife and how did you overcome it?

title: Environmental Services Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Boise, ID)
Interview Descriptions: Long process, approximately 3 months.  The first interview was with 8 nurse managers and the Chief Nursing Officer which they asked questions about how you as the EVS manager are going to improve the patient experience with the assitance of the nurse managers.  The 2nd interview was with a panel made up of the facility director, safety officer, and infection prevention nurse.
Interview Questions: How are you going tor reduce the time it takes for the housekeepers to respond to calls for room cleaning.

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Was good standard interview q's and few others. Phone call to tell about position location and hours then met with 2 people for interview. They were friendly.i have nothing else to say but it keeps asking for more more more more more more words. Is this enough yet!??
Interview Questions: Standard q's

title: Patient Services Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Fairly brief, was not asked to expand on skills listed on resume. More job duties not listed were described. Interviewer was friendly and pleasant, office staff pleasant, not much interest in specific skills overall.
Interview Questions: Could I work weekends

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System
Interview Descriptions: Had to volunteer 3 months
Interview Questions: N/A

title: EHR Abstractor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Meridian, ID) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: HR calls and talks with you about the position, then sets up a 2nd interview with the supervisor who hires which lasts less than 30 minutes. Supervisor talks about the position, and asks questions to evaluate how much she would pay you for your experience, and answers questions you have.
Interview Questions: Questions are about experience, why you decided to leave your last job or what happened and why you aren't at your last job. If you can work various shifts or drive certain distances, if you can work alone or in a team, your availability and your commitment.

title: Chief Executive Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Saint Alphonsus Health System (Boise, ID) in Jan 2008
Interview Descriptions: Good process. Dishonest organization.
Interview Questions: Dont recall
